description:
Check out Convex, the fullstack TypeScript developer platform: https://convex.dev/c/forrestknight

In this video, I code a realtime web app with TypeScript that I think y'all will really enjoy playing (and watching the build process). It's a live, weekly developer trivia game. Test your coding knowledge and compete with fellow developers! Every Wednesday at 12pm ET, join us for 10 rounds of brain-teasing questions covering everything from programming languages to computer science fundamentals. Climb the leaderboard, learn something new, and have fun with the dev community!

Dev Trivia - https://thehackershideout.com

If you're a developer, sign up to my free newsletter Dev Notes 👉 https://www.devnotesdaily.com/

If you're a student, checkout my Notion template Studious: https://notionstudent.com

Don't know why you'd want to follow me on other socials. I don't even post. But here you go.
🐱‍🚀 GitHub: https://github.com/forrestknight
🐦 Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/forrestpknight
💼
title: Coding a Realtime App with TypeScript (first match today at 12pm ET)
